description: The main plaza of Fish-Man Island where Hody Jones gathered the citizens to execute King Neptune and his sons. This is where Luffy makes his dramatic entrance and the final confrontation with the New Fish-Man Pirates begins.

keyEvents.title: Shirahoshi Reveals the Truth
keyEvents.description: Shirahoshi publicly reveals that Hody Jones killed Queen Otohime, exposing his decade-long deception before the assembled citizens.

keyEvents.title: Luffy's Dramatic Entrance
keyEvents.description: Luffy emerges from Megalo's mouth onto the plaza in a heroic entrance that the citizens had been desperately hoping for.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Kicks Hody
keyEvents.description: Luffy delivers a powerful Gear 2 kick to Hody Jones, sending him flying through the plaza walls and beginning the final battle.

keyEvents.title: The Thousand Sunny Arrives
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hat Pirates' ship arrives at the plaza with the rest of the crew, executing their coordinated rescue plan.

keyEvents.title: Friend or Foe Question
keyEvents.description: Luffy asks the assembled citizens whether the Straw Hats are friends or enemies, leaving the decision to them.

significance: Gyoncorde Plaza serves as the stage for the climactic confrontation between the Straw Hats and the New Fish-Man Pirates. It's where the truth about Queen Otohime's assassination is finally revealed to the public, and where Luffy demonstrates his commitment to helping Fish-Man Island while respecting the citizens' autonomy to choose their own allies.
